actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its HP.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell
special_abilities.desc: The quipper's Perception is 13 when perceiving by smell.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The quipper can breathe only underwater.
